subject: Education
title: Spaced Repetition: The Most Powerful Study Method
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Spaced Repetition: The Most Powerful Study Method.

hook.text: Reviewing material once after 1 day, 3 days, and 7 days makes you remember 90%. Cramming the night before gives you 20%.

buildup.text: Spaced repetition exploits the forgetting curve: review just as you're about to forget, and the memory strengthens

discovery.text: Flashcard apps like Anki use algorithms to schedule reviews at optimal intervals. It's like a personal trainer for your

twist.text: Despite decades of evidence, almost no schools teach spaced repetition. Students reinvent bad study habits every

climax.text: Spaced repetition is the single most effective study technique ever validated by research. It's free, simple, and

punchline.text: The best way to remember is to almost forget, then review. Repeat forever.
